release_notes.en-US:
*update* 
IMO the extension should work with Thunderbird 3, but this needs some testing....

[needs Thunderbird min. 1.5]

if you have any problems running QMMC (up to now it was tested for win, linux and OS X) or ideas how to improve it, please let me know (e.g. by mail) and i will try to find a solution :-)

#KNOWN ISSUES#

1.MboxImport:
There may be problems with an installed MboxImport extension. in such cases MboxImport has to be deactivated *temporary* during the QMMC installation.

2. Context-Menu in Message Window
The QMMC menu does not appear in the context menu of an open message but only in the mailbox/accoun view. This problem will be fixed in 0.9.2.2

3. Folder Names
There may be problems with some special characters (e.g. chinese). I am working on that problem already.

description.en-US:
QuickMenu for MoveTo and CopyTo:
The extension memorizes the most often used folders and offers a quick access to copy or move messages to this folders (see preview picture). The default setting is 4, but you can modify the number of folders to be memorized using the config editor (/Tools/Options.../Advanced/General/Config Editor/QuickMenuMC.Slots).

[needs Thunderbird min. 1.5]

caption.en-US: Quick access to often used folders.
